posts.post_title: FS T207 Brown Border Gabby Street, New York Highlanders
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this sharp T207 Brown Border Gabby Street for sale. Card is VG condition. No creases. Light corner wear. Clean back.

Price: $125.00 delivered.

Payment: Paypal (no fees). Check. Money order. 

First post with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe
Nice card, sir! My Gabby looks like crap next to yours. Best of luck selling; well worth the price!
